Name: Clever Jasper's Tea
Instructions: POUR all ingredients into a soda syphon. Charge with CO2 and thoroughly before dispensing into glass filled with ice made with water infused with kaffir lime leaf and ginger. Special ingredient #1 : Lemon juice clarified with Agar-Agar Special ingredient #2 : Lemon grass infused syrup
History: Created in 2016 by Aiste Valiukaite at Native, Aberdeen for Jack Daniel’s Tennessee Calling competition.
Nutrition: One serving of Clever Jasper's Tea contains 101 calories
Garnish: Lemon verbena sprig & stick of lemon grass
